Do you ever forget to write your daily journal, despite spending hours online? You're not alone. In today's always-connected world, our browsers are constantly open - so why not use them to build better habits?

Daily Weekly Monthly helps you harness the internet for positive routine building. Schedule any website to open automatically at specific times, turning your browsing habits into a force for good.

Key Features:
‚ú® Flexible Scheduling: Daily, weekly, monthly, or yearly intervals
‚è∞ Precise Timing: Set exact times for websites to open
üîÑ Smart Recovery: Never miss an event - URLs open on next browser launch if you were offline
üé® Visual Timeline: See all your scheduled events at a glance
‚ö° Lightweight & Privacy-Focused: Works entirely in your browser

Perfect for:
- Daily journaling reminders
- Weekly planning sessions
- Monthly budget reviews
- Yearly goal check-ins
- Regular learning sessions
- Team standups
- Social media scheduling
- Regular backups
- Habit tracking
- Newsletter scheduling

In an age of digital distraction, Daily Weekly Monthly transforms your browser from a source of scattered attention into a powerful tool for building consistent habits. Whether you're a journalist, student, professional, or anyone looking to build better online routines, this extension helps you stay on track.
